column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Absolutely unbelievable!  The best steak I have ever eaten
column2: 42 day aged bone-in ribeye!  To die for!  The restaurant has it all from ambiance to service to good and drink quality. Our server
column4: was the best. Totally attentive to our needs from wine and steak recommendations
column6: she was right on. Very knowledgeable about her menu and a very pleasant personality. I would recommend Bavette's for any occasion!
